title: Tiny Pasture
description:
Tiny Pasture is your charming little farm simulator that cozies up at the bottom of your screen, keeping you company while you work or study. In this game, you can buy adorable baby animals, grow them, and collect coins dropped from them once they’re all grown up to rake in some sweet profits and expand your pasture. When you improve yourself and have fun, your little critters will grow with you.
Unlock New Species Rabbits, foxes, alpacas, birds and even slimes and zombies ? Before long, you’ll have an entire animal army!
Get Interactive with Your Animals Feed them, click on them, and watch them grow happily! You can also click on them with the middle mouse button to make them follow your cursor around THE KING OF FIGHTERS XIII GLOBAL MATCH
Raise a New Life Place the Mystery Curtain in the Pasture and choose two adult animals of the same species. After a while, they’ll breed and bring forth newborn animals!
Magic Pasture Purchase and deploy magical facilities to help you keep your animals clean and healthy Freely drag and adjust the length of the pasture. Place it anywhere on your screen
